channel.title: Http on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Http on TLDRBins

item.title: Advance wget
item.description: Advance wget # Provide a file with urls wget --input-file <FILE_PATH> # POST a file wget --post-file <FILE_PATH> <TARGET> # Overwrite a file wget <TARGET>/<FILE> -O <FILE_PATH> # Get all files from index (Bypass slash restriction) wget -r <TARGET> -nd

item.title: curl
item.description: curl # Show header only curl -I <TARGET> # Save as the same name as the file on the server curl <TARGET>/<FILE> -O # GET url-encoded query curl -G --data-urlencode '<QUERY_STRING>' <TARGET> # POST url-encoded data curl --data-urlencode '<DATA>' <TARGET> # PUT a file curl -X PUT <TARGET>/<FILE> -d @<FILE> # PUT a file (Authenticate) curl -X PUT -u '<USER>:<PASSWORD>' <TARGET>/<FILE> -d @<FILE> # PUT a file as raw binary (Preserve newlines and control characters) curl -X PUT <TARGET>/<FILE> --data-binary @<FILE> # POST data as raw binary (Preserve newlines and control characters) curl -X PUT <TARGET>/<FILE> --data-binary $'<DATA>' # POST a file with form param curl -X POST -F '<PARAM>=@<FILE>;type=<APPLICATION_TYPE>;filename=<FILE>' <TARGET> # POST a file in raw-text format (Not as attachment) curl -X POST -F '<PARAM>=<<FILE>' <TARGET> # Not to handle sequences of '/.

item.title: Subdomain Enum
item.description: Add Domain/Subdomain to '/etc/hosts' echo "<TARGET_IP> <DOMAIN>" | sudo tee -a /etc/hosts wfuzz gobuster Subdomain Enum wfuzz -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/DNS/bitquark-subdomains-top100000.txt -H "Host: FUZZ.<DOMAIN>" -u 'http://<DOMAIN>' # Take note of the word size, Ctrl+C to interrupt the process, then run again wfuzz -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/DNS/bitquark-subdomains-top100000.txt -H "Host: FUZZ.<DOMAIN>" -u 'http://<DOMAIN>' --hw <WORD> Filter Out Response with Header wfuzz -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/DNS/bitquark-subdomains-top100000.txt -H "Origin: http://FUZZ.<DOMAIN>" --filter "r.headers.response ~ '<HEADER>'" -u 'http://<DOMAIN>' # For example: Access-Control-Allow-Origin wfuzz -w /usr/share/seclists/Discovery/DNS/bitquark-subdomains-top100000.

item.title: WebDAV
item.description: Tools davtest curl # Without creds davtest -url http://<TARGET> # With creds davtest -url http://<TARGET> -auth '<USER>:<PASSWORD>' Ref: Download davtest # Rename a remote file curl -X MOVE -H 'Destination:http://<TARGET>/<NEW_FILENAME>' http://<TARGET>/<FILE>
